Review Text:
Gezellig restaurant, vriendelijk personeel.
Je kunt je eigen muziek aanvragen en nog lekker eten. Als je geluk hebt krijg je een biertoren
Good beers good times, and good Music, Nice staff and all things considered a good visit nice nice nice nice nice nice that’s 100
Spot on service , food drink and locality. would 100% recommend this restaurant for family friends and couples. And very reasonably priced. Thank you

1 heure d’attente pour une pizza. Ils avaient oublié notre commande. La patronne du restaurant était plus affairée à consulter son téléphone et à s’occuper de ses décorations pour le Têt (1er de l’An chinois) que par ses clients. La pizza était correct mais le prix l’était moins. Nous sommes évidemment au pied de la tour Bitexco, ceci justifie peut être cela. Ils ont cependant eu la délicatesse de nous apporter quelques cacahuètes grillés pour nous faire patienter. 
Je ne recommande pas du tout cet établissement sachant qu’il y a beaucoup de choix en s’éloignant de ce quartier pour des tarifs bien plus attractifs.
Servers were lovely and food was exceptional! Would recommend 👌🏼 we came out after a long day and the food really hit the spot!
Excellent place great food and prices fantastic air conditioning brilliant staff a must visit when in Ho Chi Minh city..
Absolutely scrumptious meal and nice cold refreshing drinks in a cool chilled environment with amazing friendly staff ! Highly recommend!!

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 5
Dịch vụ: 5
Đồ ăn: 5
Không khí: 5
Review Text: Had a great night, great service quality food at good prices.Highly recommend for a good meal in the heart of Saigon.

It was a good place in a busy area & friendly staff, huge variety of food at good prices  - I just can't rave about it sorry. The food was fine, just not amazing.  Always annoying when your fries to go with your mains come out before your entree & one person's meal comes out when everyone else has nearly finished eating.

Review Title: Gutes Lokal, nette Mitarbeiter und leckeres Essen
Review Text: Sehr nette Mitarbeiter und leckeres Essen. Die Gerichte sind sehr vielseitig und eine gute Auswahl, vom Burger über Pizza zum Steak
Excellent food and service, me and my partner had two red rooster beers and one Hong Kong chicken noodles and one beef. Superb

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 4
Dịch vụ: 5
Đồ ăn: 5
Không khí: 4
Review Text:
Nice restaurant in the center of Ho Chi Minh.
We ate the steak, tiger prawns and french fries.  Delicious!
The personnel was very friendly.
As it was our first day in Vietnam,  Ha gave us tips for the vacation...
Highly recommended

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 5
Dịch vụ: 5
Đồ ăn: 5
Không khí: 5
Review Title: Fantastic Experience at the Big Pig
Review Text:
First time to Ho Chi Minh City. My brother and I were recommended the Big Pig bar and BBQ and we were not disappointed.
Fantastic service, food and music. Louis really looked after us..... Thank you Louis and the Big Pig staff for a very enjoyable dining experience....we will certainly be back !!!
Jann and Gary from Tasmania.

Review Title: Great tastes with so many choices.
Review Text:
The newest Big Pig location located in District 1 is in an excellent location. The food as always very good and reasonably priced for all budgets. Includes a happy hour in the after noon with buy one get one options. 

Out dishes were excellent with  great taste  . Service was also top notch.

Highly recommend you try on your next visit to HCMC for both western dishes and Vietnamese choices. Pizza 🍕 is also excellent 

👨‍🍳

Amazing find in District 1 Ho Chi Minh. Serves western style food that’s tastes so good. Their menu catered well for teenagers who wanted a change. Staff are well spoken in English and engaged in great conversation. Definitely worth the visit.

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 4
Dịch vụ: 5
Đồ ăn: 4
Review Text:
Needed a cold beer after sightseeing all day. Grabbed a local rooster beer….. not disappointed. 
Staff especially Louis are great.  Travelling for 3 weeks through this beautiful country only eating traditional Vietnamese fare but decided to go for a burger today. Great decision. If you’re visiting Saigon drop into Big Pig bar. Welcoming, beers cold and always have heaps of promos.

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 5
Dịch vụ: 5
Đồ ăn: 5
Review Text: After a big day of sightseeing we found the BIG PIG. What a relief.. i had  a  SAIGON SUMMER cocktail. Looked amazing and tasted just as good. Decided to stay for a burger. Although we have embrassed the local cuisine we felt today we needed a good burger.. just like home. They didnt disappoint. It was spot on. Staff were friendly and accomodating.

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 5

Đồ ăn: 5
Review Text:
Great food.. Friendly staff.. 

Highly recommended. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Amazing menu choice..

For a good price 👌🏼

Review Title: Good food + good beer + good location + great staff 😊👍
Review Text:
Fabulous service and really lovely, friendly staff. Excellent draft Tiger (& 1664 if you fancy imported) plus a good array of bottled beers and a Saigon gin 😊
Menu is a great selection of ribs, burgers and steaks etc. 
Definitely worth a visit 👍
Bof pizza chère et tout juste moyenne a éviter dans tout ce quartier les restaurants sont a des prix astronomiques et pas terribles

Additional Ratings:
Giá trị: 5
Dịch vụ: 5
Đồ ăn: 5
Review Text: Great place for food and drinks!!!!  It’s beer is ice cold and nice A/C to cool off from the hot Saigon heat. The wait staff was great and friendly and they have a great happy hour. A must for good drinks and food!!!

Big Pig BBQ &Beer bar is a great bar for Draught/bottled beers and food. The Pizza's are Amazing, we had a large to share between 2 of us. The location is perfect if your visiting the Sky Deck of the Bitexco Financial Tower as it is on the road to the right of the exit.
Great service, friendly staff
Visited today, very warm welcome,  service was spot on! Ordered pizzas which were delicious, very friendly staff, all round a great experience!

Review Title: Great little bar with fantastic food and drink
Review Text:
Great little bar with a comprehensive menu covering many different foods including local and European food. A good selection of beers both bottled and draught!!
Food was lovely and piping hot, didn’t leave a scrap. Def worth a visit if you’re in the area!!!

Review Title: カジュアル美味しいイタリアン
Review Text: パスタとピザを食べました！パスタはもちもち、ピザはチーズ多めでとても美味しく、店員さんも優しく居心地の良く過ごすことが出来ました。言葉の分からない私達にも親切に教えてくれました。ビールも安いと思います！！
